text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The Triforce Arcade Board was a joint creation by Nintendo, Sega, and Namco. The name is a reference the three companies working together and to the famous triforce symbol from Nintendo's own Zelda franchise. The hardware is very similar to the GameCube with a few enhancements. Some of the more noteworthy games include F-Zero AX from Sega and Mario Kart Arcade GP from Namco
